name: Chinese Fish Ball Soup - Bee Hoon
recipeIngredient: 450g white fish fillets (haddock, cod, bream - boned and flaked),
90 g mung bean thread noodles (soaked in hot water until soft).
recipeInstructions: 1. Bring the stock to the boil.
2.1 Grind the flaked fish into a paste using a mortar and pestle or a food processor.
2.4 Sprinkle with rice flour and mould into balls.
3. Season stock and add fish balls, simmering for 5 minutes.
4. Add the shredded mustard greens and simmer for 1 minute.
5. Divide the noodles between the bowls.
6. Put the fish balls and soup into the bowls.
7. Garnish with spring onions, chilli, and chopped coriander.
